description: Creates an Amazon Redshift application for use with IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: IdcInstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center instance where Amazon Redshift creates a new managed application.

parameters.name: RedshiftIdcApplicationName
parameters.description: The name of the Redshift application in IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: IdcDisplayName
parameters.description: The display name for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application instance. It appears in the console.

parameters.name: IamRoleArn
parameters.description: The IAM role ARN for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application instance. It has the required permissions to be assumed and invoke the IDC Identity Center API.

parameters.name: AuthorizedTokenIssuerList
parameters.description: The token issuer list for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application instance. (dict) --- The authorized token issuer for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. TrustedTokenIssuerArn (string) --- The ARN for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center. AuthorizedAudiencesList (list) --- The list of audiences for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center. (string) ---

nested_params.name: TrustedTokenIssuerArn
nested_params.description: The ARN for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.

nested_params.name: AuthorizedAudiencesList
nested_params.description: The list of audiences for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.

parameters.name: ServiceIntegrations
parameters.description: A collection of service integrations for the Redshift IAM Identity Center application. (dict) --- A list of service integrations. LakeFormation (list) --- A list of scopes set up for Lake Formation integration. (dict) --- A list of scopes set up for Lake Formation integration. LakeFormationQuery (dict) --- The Lake Formation scope. Determines whether the query scope is enabled or disabled. S3AccessGrants (list) --- A list of scopes set up for S3 Access Grants integration. (dict) --- A list of scopes set up for S3 Access Grants integration. ReadWriteAccess (dict) --- The S3 Access Grants scope. Determines whether the read/write scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: LakeFormation
nested_params.description: A list of scopes set up for Lake Formation integration.

nested_params.name: Authorization
nested_params.description: Determines whether the query scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: S3AccessGrants
nested_params.description: A list of scopes set up for S3 Access Grants integration.

nested_params.name: Authorization
nested_params.description: Determines whether the read/write scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplication
nested_items.description: Contains properties for the Redshift IDC application.

nested_items.name: IdcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the IAM Identity Center instance that Redshift integrates with.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the Redshift application in IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: RedshiftIdcApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Redshift application that integrates with IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: IdentityNamespace
nested_items.description: The identity namespace for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It determines which managed application verifies the connection token.

nested_items.name: IdcDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It appears on the console.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application. It has the required permissions to be assumed and invoke the IDC Identity Center API.

nested_items.name: IdcManagedApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: IdcOnboardStatus
nested_items.description: The onboarding status for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedTokenIssuerList
nested_items.description: The authorized token issuer list for the Amazon Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedAudiencesList
nested_items.description: The list of audiences for the authorized token issuer for integrating Amazon Redshift with IDC Identity Center.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ServiceIntegrations
nested_items.description: A list of service integrations for the Redshift IAM Identity Center application.

nested_items.name: LakeFormation
nested_items.description: A list of scopes set up for Lake Formation integration.

nested_items.name: LakeFormationQuery
nested_items.description: The Lake Formation scope.

nested_items.name: Authorization
nested_items.description: Determines whether the query scope is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: S3AccessGrants
nested_items.description: A list of scopes set up for S3 Access Grants integration.

nested_items.name: ReadWriteAccess
nested_items.description: The S3 Access Grants scope.

nested_items.name: Authorization
nested_items.description: Determines whether the read/write scope is enabled or disabled.
